subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: MINNEAPOLIS — Something about the atmosphere at the Metrodome on Tuesday felt wrong to Chicago White Sox Manager Ozzie Guillén. Though his team, not the Minnesota Twins, began the day leading the American League Central Division, Guillén had the odd sense that their places were actually reversed.
